AI Description: CMake is an open-source, cross-platform family of tools designed to build, test, and package software. It is used to control the software compilation process using simple platform and compiler-independent configuration files.
Core Features:
1. Cross-platform build system
2. Automated dependency resolution
3. Package generation for multiple platforms
4. Integrated support for popular development environments
5. Extensible through custom modules
6. Supports in-place and out-of-place builds
7. Versatile project configuration options
